comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when drag a Chart from the Palette to the Crosstab row are or column area.

Build number: 
2.2.1.v20070903-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Drag a Crosstab from the Palette to the Layout.
2. Drag a Chart from the Palette to the Crosstab row area or column area.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out through this behavior is forbidden.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
